Changelog
=========

0.1.2 (2014-06-06)
------------------

- Nothing changed yet.


0.1.1 (2014-06-04)
------------------

- changed uninstall: keep the tool object, otherwise existing templates gets removed on reinstall
- added default template on fresh install


0.1 (2014-05-02)
----------------

- Inital release (prototype)
- Added uninstall profile
